effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 745,458 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 293,524.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,367 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 194 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call the Darkness to you, increasing your Intellect by 2,355, up to 11,776.

Upon reaching full power, the Darkness is unleashed, inflicting 1.6 million Shadow damage split between nearby enemies over 15 sec before fading back into the remnant.
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
